main event: A bright, metallic object was observed moving at high speed over the Baltic Sea in Sweden.
interesting points: The object was flat, brilliantly lighted, and appeared to be a large size.
The object moved at a very high speed and left no trace.
The object's apparent size was that of a dinner plate and it was about 15-20 feet above the water.
The brilliant light radiated by the object was observed for 5-10 seconds before it disappeared.
The observer was unable to form a definite opinion on the nature of the object, but stated its behavior was unlike any known conventional aircraft.
sighted object: a flat, brilliantly lighted, metallic object
